title: Six heavy fish and a ton of sinkers
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Roland Beckett
brief_description: Historical re-enactments recount the story of the location, recovery and restoration of six cannons jettisoned by Captain James Cook when the “Endeavour” struck a reef off the coast of what is now Queensland. Good use of underwater photography.
